body: Hi! Actually I want to run an annual radiation analysis in the inside of a greenhouse. CM-sky I suppose is the right one, at least it gives me the possibility in defining an analysis period. But it's actually not running... Any idea out here? Could it be the connection btw. the skyFilePath and the _skyFile? THX, Daniel [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VRZzgEZ7j90h1ajKhVRtljeuPk*GlpG11jUjl9IDsx2lRz3FJDVv1RpHNT5zmKcpmivqV7ErOi0jpucOxPZkY*YeooRVucBB/gh_gh.jpg)
topic: cumulative sky - index out of range
